channel.title: Bittrex wallet issue
channel.description:
Dear BitBay team,
the scammers who lead the Bittrex exchange removed a wallet with my tokens in it without any notice and now don't want to help me get them back. Can you help me recover the tokens or get revenge against Bittrex?
Thank you in advance.

item.title: Bittrex wallet issue
item.dc:creator: @Craig_Claussen
item.description:
@Craig_Claussen wrote:

I wish we could help. It was sad to see them abandon us without any real reason. I hope one day they will realize their error of judgement.

Read full topic
